title: # 480 - Chase Friedman & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with my friend and recovering quadriplegic, Chase Friedman. Chase was involved in an accident that left him paralyzed from the shoulders down but has made a miraculous recovery. We talk all about his accident, recovery, viral fame, and much more! 

 

Follow Chase’s social media here:

TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@chasegetsbetter?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chaseunfiltered 

 

This episode is brought to you by 3CHi. Go to http://www.3chi.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 5% off your order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs. Enter promo code “BERT” and get a free Whistle Tip Football at http://www.birddogs.com  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Grunt Style. Go to http://www.gruntstyle.com/discount/bert for an additional 10% off your first order of any items. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
